meanings.definition: The basic monetary unit of Finland before the adoption of the euro.
meanings.sent1: In the past, people in Finland used markkaa to buy things.
meanings.sent2: I have five markkaa in my wallet.
meanings.sent3: The markkaa decided to take a vacation from being spent.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was worth more than a million markkaa.
meanings.sent5: The shiny markkaa sparkled in the sunlight.

meanings.sent1: She collected many markkaa from different countries.
meanings.sent2: The jar was filled with colorful markkaa.
meanings.sent3: The markkaa gathered together for a secret meeting.
meanings.sent4: His words were like scattered markkaa, each holding a different memory.
meanings.sent5: The sound of the falling markkaa echoed in the room.
